Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks broke a five-game losing streak by defeating the Los Angeles Lakers 118-97.
LeBron James nearly had a triple-double with 18 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James praised the Mavericks' gameplan and execution.
LeBron James expressed disappointment over the Lakers' performance and the outcome of their two-game road trip to Texas.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas moved ahead of the Lakers in the Western Conference standings with this win.
The Mavericks managed the victory without key players Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
